question: Berikan contoh implementasi Big Data di bidang masing-masing selain yang disebutkan di modul.
ground_truth: Here are some examples of Big Data implementation in various fields: 1. Social Media Sentiment Analysis: Companies can use Big Data to analyze sentiment on social media towards their brand, product or service. By monitoring millions of tweets, Facebook posts, and other online reviews, they can understand customer views in real-time, identify trends, and respond quickly to changing perceptions or emerging issues. 2. Health Data Processing: In the health sector, Big Data is used to analyze clinical, genomic and other patient data to discover patterns, trends, and associations that can assist in disease diagnosis, drug development, and more effective and personalized treatment planning. 3. Supply Chain Optimization: Companies operating in the manufacturing or retail industry use Big Data to optimize their supply chains. By analyzing data related to customer demand, inventory, and production processes, they can identify areas where efficiency can be improved, reduce costs, and increase customer satisfaction by ensuring the right product is available at the right time.

By monitoring millions of tweets, Facebook posts, and other online reviews, they can understand customer views in real-time, identify trends, and respond quickly to changing perceptions or emerging issues. 2. Health Data Processing: In the health sector, Big Data is used to analyze clinical, genomic and other patient data to discover patterns, trends, and associations that can assist in disease diagnosis, drug development, and more effective and personalized treatment planning. 3. Supply Chain Optimization: Companies operating in the manufacturing or retail industry use Big Data to optimize their supply chains. By analyzing data related to customer demand, inventory, and production processes, they can identify areas where efficiency can be improved, reduce costs, and increase customer satisfaction by ensuring the right product is available at the right time.
answer: Secara garis besar, matematika dapat dikatakan sebagai dasar dalam Big Data. Hal ini dikarenakan dalam melakukan analisis data, tentu banyak digunakan pengetahuan-pengetahuan di bidang matematika, terutama statistika. Dengan demikian, pada dasarnya dapat dikatakan bahwa implementasi Big Data di setiap bidang merupakan implementasi Big Data di bidang matematika. Adapun contoh implementasi Big Data, yaitu :  Pengembangan sistem peramalan banyaknya kasus penyakit tertentu per minggu per wilayah berdasarkan data penyakit yang telah dihimpun sebelumnya. Tentunya untuk menciptakan sistem yang memiliki tingkat keakuratan prediksi tinggi, diperlukan data dalam jumlah banyak Big Data, sehingga sistem atau program yang disusun bisa melakukan prediksi dengan berdasarkan banyak kasus data yang telah terjadi. Dalam implementasi ini, selain digunakannya Big Data, diperlukan juga pengetahuan di bidang statistika dan matematika, khususnya mengenai regresi atau peramalan secara statistik.  Optimisasi rute pengiriman logistik oleh suatu perusahaan. Untuk menciptakan suatu program optimisasi, diperlukan data dalam jumlah banyak Big Data untuk memastikan keakuratan algoritma. Dalam implementasi ini, selain digunakannya Big Data, diperlukan juga pengetahuan di bidang matematika dan ilmu komputer, khususnya mengenai teori graf dan riset operasi.

question: Sebutkan dan jelaskan secara singkat ciri-ciri kumpulan data disebut Big Data
ground_truth: The characteristics of a data collection called Big Data are often summarized by the "5Vs": 1. Volume: Refers to the enormous amount of data generated every day. 2. Velocity: Indicates the rate at which new data is generated and how quickly it needs to be processed. 3. Variety: Describes the different types and sources of data available, including structured, unstructured, and semi-structured data. 4. Veracity: Relates to the quality and accuracy of data. 5. These characteristics highlight the scale, complexity, and diversity of Big Data, which require specialized processing and analysis techniques to extract valuable insights.

answer: Secara sederhana, kumpulan data agar disebut Big Data memiliki ciri-ciri berikut, yaitu :  Data yang ada pada kumpulan data sangat banyak dan terus tumbuh secara eksponensial seiring waktu. question: Apa perbedaan database relational dan data warehouse?
ground_truth: The three main differences between a relational database and a data warehouse are: 1. Intended Use: Relational databases are designed for daily transactional and operational data (OLTP), while data warehouses are designed for data analysis and business reporting (OLAP). 2. Data Structure: Relational databases use a structured schema with tables, rows, and columns, whereas data warehouses use a format optimized for querying and analysis, often using a star schema or snow schema. 3. Optimization: Relational databases are optimized for speed and efficiency in processing small to medium data transactions in real-time, whereas data warehouses are optimized for big data processing and analysis, supporting complex and data-intensive read operations.
answer: 1. Data Warehouse Model Data Warehouse, juga dikenal sebagai gudang data perusahaan adalah sistem yang digunakan untuk pelaporan dan analisis data dan dianggap sebagai komponen inti dari intelijen bisnis.

question: Apa perbedaan database relational dan data warehouse?
ground_truth: The three main differences between a relational database and a data warehouse are: 1. Data ini dapat diakses dengan berbagai cara tanpa menyusun ulang tabel basis data itu sendiri. Database Warehouse adalah sistem basis data yang biasa digunakan untuk pelaporan dan analisis data. Sistem ini dianggap sebagai komponen inti dari business intelligence. Database Warehouse merupakan repositori sentral data yang terpadu dari satu atau lebih sumber yang berbeda. Database tersebut juga menyimpan data terkini dan historis dengan satu tempat yang digunakan untuk membuat laporan analisis.
